attributes.action: Grow more native trees throughout the world especially in Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To combat global warming using a natural defence against carbon dioxide, the world could grow more native trees. They are cheap to buy, maintain and last a lifetime. We need to replace all we have lost and so will beat all mankinds` unwanted greenhouse gases/emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
